name: Experiment
description: Document Describing Information About the Experiment; Experiment ID

properties.comments: Assigned by server at different stages.
properties.domain: enum(Add, Modify, Hold, Cancel, Suppress, Release, Protect, Validate)

properties.description: Version of this data model schema

properties.description: Temperature at which the cell culture was passaged

properties.description: Total duration of differentiation, in days

properties.description: Media additives used in this differentiation stage

properties.description: Confluency of cell culture - proportion of surface in a culture dish or a flask which is covered by cells

properties.description: Type of serum (Not vesicle depleted, Vesicle depleted in-house, Purchased vesicle depleted)

properties.description: Was filtration performed pre-freeze or post-freeze?
